item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0419; 08:08AM; 14242 W Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zjG6sg; Van Nuys; A large outside fire spread to one vacant single-family home and threatened others. Twenty-eight firefighters extinguished the flames in 13 minutes (8:25am), holding the fire to just the first involved structure. Firefighter-paramedics are providing medical assessment and care to one female patient on scene. Cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E102 E239 E289 E81 RA102 RA39 RA839 T39 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1158; 04:18PM; 8121 N Aura Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zgHonS; #Reseda; 38 Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a 1,296 square-foot one-story home. No injury. Though there was a reported behavioral emergency with alleged fire setting by a person ostensibly associated with the residence prior to the first 9-1-1 call, the specific cause of the fire and circumstances prior to Firefighter's arrival remain under active investigation. That person of interest is currently being interviewed at scene by LAPD (West Valley, Incident #2982). LA DWP en route to assist with electrical wires down in the vicinity.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E290 E293 E73 EM17 RA70 RA73 RA872 T73 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1158; 04:00PM; 8121 N Aura Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zgHonS; #Reseda; PRELIM: One-story home with attic well involved with fire.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E290 RA73 RA872 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1907; 11:47PM; 779 N Alexandria Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3m4ZTn8; #EastHollywood; *Address Corrected* to 779. Seventy LAFD Firefighters took just 30 minutes (12:17 AM) in largely defensive firefighting operations to access, confine and extinguish flames within a fully involved vacant and boarded 1,738 square-foot one-story single family home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC14 BC5 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E29 E482 E52 E82 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA52 RA806 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1907; 11:47PM; 801 N Alexandria Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PUGxyU; #EastHollywood; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on a fully involved vacant single family home; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC14 BC5 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E27 E29 E482 E52 E82 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA52 RA806 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Structure Fire Injured Animal Update - 06/01/2022 INC#1447

item.description: Update Injured Animal Update - Structure Fire; INC#1447; 08:00PM; 812 N Virgil Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x43EhL; #EastHollywood; *Correction* on injured animal tally: LAFD Firefighters rescued a total of fourteen (14) animals (9 dogs and 5 cats) in varying levels of distress, from the smoke-charged premises. All nine (9) dogs. and three (3) cats survived after being provided oxygen by face mask, and were entrusted to the care of the City's Department of Animal Services. Two (2) of the rescued cats sadly proved beyond medical help and were determined dead at the scene. No human injuries were reported. The fire's cause remains under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E211 E220 E235 E29 E482 E52 RA20 RA52 RA806 T11 T20 T35; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1447; 06:18PM; 812 N Virgil Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3x43EhL; #EastHollywood; 38 LAFD Firefighters took just 25 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish (6:43 PM) a small contents fire within "Pet Joy" (a yet undetermined type pet business) in a row of one-story commercial occupancies. Firefighters performed a simultaneous search during fire attack, to rescue fifteen (15) animals from within the heavily smoke-charged premises. Sadly 2 dogs and 2 cats proved beyond medical help and perished at the scene. LAFD Firefighters are providing comfort and medical assistance, including oxygen via face mask to the remaining eight (8) dogs and three (3) cats, all of whom were exposed to smoke. Responders from the City's Department of Animal Services are en route to provide additional care and support (ETA 7:15 PM). No human injuries have been reported. The fire's cause remains under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E211 E220 E235 E29 E482 E52 RA20 RA52 RA806 T11 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1773; 10:49PM; 320 W Ross Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3agyNqM; #Wilmington; 31 Firefighters took just 14 minutes in offensive firefighting operations, to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within one upstairs unit of a 5,800 square-foot, eight unit, 2 story garden style apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E248 E285 E38 E49 RA38 RA85 T38 T48 T85; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1773; 10:35PM; 320 W Ross Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3agyNqM; #Wilmington; PRELIM: 2 story garden style apartment with one upstairs unit well involved with fire; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E248 E285 E38 E49 RA38 RA85 T38 T48 T85; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Hazardous Materials Investigation; INC#0392; 07:58AM; 350 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lZPj0T; #HistoricSouthCentral; Six adult workers have been medically evaluated by LAFD after they experienced brief respiratory irritation upon entering a legal cannabis operation, which they were opening for daily business. The site had reportedly been sprayed overnight with pesticide while closed. All six workers have declined further medical care or ambulance transportation. LAFD Hazmat experts have determined there is presently no off-site or escalating hazard. No other illness or injury has been reported.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E17 E21 E221 E46 E7 EM11 JT3 RA15 RA21 RA46 SQ21 T21; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey
